Get ESPN QBR for NFL football

Source: R/scrape_nfl_espn_qbr.R
get_nfl_qbr.Rd

Get ESPN QBR for NFL football

get_nfl_qbr(season = 2019, week = NA, season_type = "Regular")

Arguments

season

Either numeric or character
week

Either NA to return season or week 1 to 4 for playoffs or 1 to 17 for regular
season_type

Character - either "Regular" or "Playoffs"

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get ALL Playoff QBR from 2016 season
get_nfl_qbr("2016", season_type = "Playoffs", week = NA)
#> Scraping QBR totals for 2016!
#> # A tibble: 12 x 20
#>    season season_type game_week  rank first_name last_name name  short_name
#>     <dbl> <chr>       <chr>     <int> <chr>      <chr>     <chr> <chr>     
#>  1   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     1 Matt       Ryan      Matt… M. Ryan   
#>  2   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     2 Aaron      Rodgers   Aaro… A. Rodgers
#>  3   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     3 Tom        Brady     Tom … T. Brady  
#>  4   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     4 Dak        Prescott  Dak … D. Presco…
#>  5   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     5 Russell    Wilson    Russ… R. Wilson 
#>  6   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     6 Ben        Roethlis… Ben … B. Roethl…
#>  7   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     7 Eli        Manning   Eli … E. Manning
#>  8   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     8 Matt       Moore     Matt… M. Moore  
#>  9   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …     9 Matthew    Stafford  Matt… M. Staffo…
#> 10   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …    10 Brock      Osweiler  Broc… B. Osweil…
#> 11   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …    11 Alex       Smith     Alex… A. Smith  
#> 12   2016 Playoffs    Playoff …    12 Connor     Cook      Conn… C. Cook   
#> # … with 12 more variables: team_name <chr>, team_short_name <chr>,
#> #   qbr_total <dbl>, points_added <dbl>, qb_plays <dbl>, total_epa <dbl>,
#> #   pass <dbl>, run <dbl>, exp_sack <dbl>, penalty <dbl>, raw_qbr <dbl>,
#> #   sack <dbl>

# Get Regular season QBR for week 4 of 2019
get_nfl_qbr("2019", season_type = "Regular", week = 4)
#> Scraping weekly QBR for week 4 of 2019!
#> # A tibble: 31 x 20
#>    season season_type game_week  rank first_name last_name name  short_name
